Protocols/ColorSliderPreviewing.html#/s:.name: colorChanged(to:)
Protocols/ColorSliderPreviewing.html#/s:.abstract: Called when the color of the slider changes, so the preview can respond correctly.

Protocols/ColorSliderPreviewing.html#/s:.name: transition(to:)
Protocols/ColorSliderPreviewing.html#/s:.abstract: Called when the preview changes state and should update its appearance appropriately.

Protocols/ColorSliderPreviewing.html.name: ColorSliderPreviewing
Protocols/ColorSliderPreviewing.html.abstract: A protocol defining callback methods for a ColorSlider preview view.

Enums/PreviewState.html#/s:11ColorSlider.name: inactive
Enums/PreviewState.html#/s:11ColorSlider.abstract: The color is not being changed and the preview view is centered at the last modified point.

Enums/PreviewState.html#/s:11ColorSlider.name: activeFixed
Enums/PreviewState.html#/s:11ColorSlider.abstract: The color is still being changed, but the preview view center is fixed.

Enums/PreviewState.html#/s:11ColorSlider.name: active
Enums/PreviewState.html#/s:11ColorSlider.abstract: The color is being actively changed and the preview view center will be updated to match the current color.

Enums/Orientation.html.name: Orientation
Enums/Orientation.html.abstract: The orientation in which the ColorSlider is drawn.

Enums/PreviewState.html.name: PreviewState
Enums/PreviewState.html.abstract: The display state of a preview view.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.name: left
Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.abstract: Show the preview to the left of the slider. Valid when the ColorSlider orientation is vertical.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.name: right
Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.abstract: Show the preview to the right of the slider. Valid when the ColorSlider orientation is vertical.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.name: top
Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.abstract: Show the preview to the top of the slider. Valid when the ColorSlider orientation is horizontal.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.name: bottom
Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html#/s:.abstract: Show the preview to the bottom of the slider. Valid when the ColorSlider orientation is horizontal.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.name: animationDuration
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.abstract: The animation duration when showing the preview. Defaults to 0.15.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html.name: Side
Classes/DefaultPreviewView/Side.html.abstract: The side of the ColorSlider on which to show the preview view.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/s:11Col.name: side
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/s:11Col.abstract: The side of the ColorSlider that the preview should show on. Defaults to .left.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/s:11Col.name: scaleAmounts
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/s:11Col.abstract: The scale of the slider for each preview state.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.name: offsetAmount
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.abstract: The number of points to offset the preview view from the slider when the state is set to .active. Defaults to 50.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.name: offset
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.abstract: The actual offset of the preview view, calculated from offsetAmount and side.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.name: colorView
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.abstract: The view that displays the current color as its backgroundColor.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.name: hapticsEnabled
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.abstract: Enable haptics on iPhone 7 and above for state transitions to/from .activeFixed. Defaults to true.

Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.name: calculateOffset()
Classes/DefaultPreviewView.html#/c:@M@Co.abstract: Calculate the offset of the preview view when offset or side are set.

Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.name: automaticallyAdjustsCornerRadius
Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.abstract: Whether the gradient should adjust its corner radius based on its bounds.

Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.name: saturation
Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.abstract: The saturation of all colors in the view.

Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.name: whiteInset
Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.abstract: The percent of space at the beginning (top for orientation .vertical and left for orientation .horizontal) end of the slider reserved for the color white.

Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.name: blackInset
Classes/GradientView.html#/c:@M@ColorSli.abstract: The percent of space at the end (bottom for orientation .vertical and right for orientation .horizontal) end of the slider reserved for the color black.

Classes/ColorSlider.html#/s:11ColorSlide.name: previewView
Classes/ColorSlider.html#/s:11ColorSlide.abstract: The preview view, passed in the required initializer.

Classes/ColorSlider.html.name: ColorSlider
Classes/ColorSlider.html.abstract: ColorSlider is a customizable color picker with live preview.

Classes/GradientView.html.name: GradientView
Classes/GradientView.html.abstract: A gradient view that acts as the background of any ColorSlider.
